extendedInfo.description: The Fleetmatics Always On utility tool ensures that the Fleetmatics Driver App is consistently running while in use on your Android device. â¢	Always On ensures that the Driver App functions are not disrupted while logged into the app.  â¢	The Driver App will restart automatically if shut down on the device.â¢	Always On runs in the background of the operating system and will not interfere with any other applications being used. Please Note: You must be a Fleetmatics customer with a username and password to use the Fleetmatics Driver App. Not a FleetMatics customer yet? Call us at 866-844-2235 or visit fleetmatics.com.Looking for our app for managers? Search for Fleetmatics Mobile in the Android Apps section of Google Play
